alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 4:47PM MST until March 06 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible. Storm total snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. Snowy Range. South Laramie Range including the Interstate 80 Summit. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult or impossible due to icy, snow packed roads and low visibilities in falling and blowing snow. Hikers and snowmobilers may easily become disoriented. Frostbite and hypothermia can develop quickly.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range
